entry.string:
#unstash SDK_ID_3_NAME SDK_ID_3_NAME=$(cat env_SDK_ID_3_NAME.txt)
#Create project and set id project ID_3=$(xds-cli prj add --label="Project_hvac_"${SDK_ID_3_NAME}"" --type=pm --path=/home/jenkins/xds-workspace/hvac_"${SDK_ID_3_NAME}" --server-path=/home/devel/xds-workspace/hvac_"${SDK_ID_3_NAME}" | cut -d')' -f1 | cut -d' ' -f5)
#save ID for futur stage echo "${ID_3}" > env_ID_3.txt
